Title: Relates to a free or reduced meal plan for certain students enrolled at state and city universities
Summary: Directs the boards of trustees of SUNY and CUNY to create a free or reduced meal plan to aid students whose household incomes are below the federal poverty line, students participating in educational opportunity programs under section three hundred fifty-five-d of this article and students receiving federal Pell grants.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to a free or reduced food plan for certain students enrolled at state and city universities
